item.title: Installing Geant3 - Older Versions
item.description: The following instructions apply to the installation of the versions < 2.0. First get the Geant3 source from the Download page. No special configuration option for Root installation is needed with the actual version of Root. With old Root v5.20/00, you have to specify your Fortran compiler: --with-f77=g77   geant3 requires Pythia6 library.
